function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Slow decay of emission rate of formaldehyde and toluene","Impact":"Increased indoor air pollution and exposure to harmful chemicals","Mitigation":"Implement efficient ventilation systems and air cleaning technologies","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, botanical filters","People":"Occupants of the built environment","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and air quality experts"},{"Description":"Effect of filter bed on air temperature and RH","Impact":"Inefficient air purification and discomfort for occupants","Mitigation":"Regular maintenance of filter beds, monitoring of air temperature and RH","Technologies":"Air temperature and RH sensors","People":"Building maintenance personnel, air quality experts","Owner":"Facility managers, building owners"},{"Description":"Maximum clean air provided by the DBAF","Impact":"Inadequate air purification and increased risk of exposure to VOCs","Mitigation":"Regular testing and maintenance of HVAC system operation modes, improved ventilation strategies","Technologies":"HVAC system operation modes, VOC sampling and measurement","People":"Occupants of the built environment, air quality experts","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"}]}
